# Introduction {#intro}

## Shiny App Embedding Example

The below Shiny app is taken from the [Bookdown documentation](https://bookdown.org/yihui/bookdown/web-pages-and-shiny-apps.html) and was created by Yihui and hosted on shinyapps.io


```{r}
knitr::include_app("https://yihui.shinyapps.io/miniUI/",
  height = "600px")
```
